promptPrefix:
I will provide you a sentence with the following TOPIC, AUDIENCE and WORDCOUNT. These 3 variables will be separated by semi-colon. In case I do not provide a WORDCOUNT, consider a minimum of 600 words. 

Then replace these 3 variables in Objective.

Sentence: [PROMPT]

Objective: Motivate and persuade the AUDIENCE so they can understand the pros and cons of TOPIC and how to empower their organization. Provide a minimum of WORDCOUNT.

Style: Clear, concise, conversational, humble, and experimental.

All output shall be in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
title: Storytelling for presentations at companies
